prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that embodies cosmic energy with a star-shaped design.
I want a Pokemon that glows with celestial light and has a mysterious aura.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a celestial object, featuring vibrant yellow and blue colors.
Make a legendary Pokemon with a unique body shape that radiates cosmic power.
Imagine a mystical Pokemon that represents the vastness of space and has an eye theme.
Design a Pokemon that appeals to dreamers, with a body that shines like a star.
Give me a Pokemon that has a cosmic theme and features a radiant, star-like appearance.
